description: This is Bouvets zero dosage or unsweetened wine. We tried it at the cellars a couple of years ago for the first time.
This Gold Medal-winning Champagne is an absolute beauty and unbelievable value at under $30.
Rosé is often an afterthought in sparkling wine production, this is not the case at Bouvet.

wname: Charles de Fère Rosé Brut NV
description: South Walton Food and Wine Festival Just looking at this wine makes you thirsty.

wname: Ch de Pena Cotes du Roussillon Villages 2014
description: Impressively ripe and opulent, the beautifully lifted bouquet shows blackberry

wname: Grand Veneur Côtes du Rhône Réserve 2015
description: Yet another winner from the passionate and hardworking Jaume family. Supple, gluggable and full of southern French warmth and character.
Rated among the Worlds Greatest Wine Estates
Impressively ripe and opulent, the beautifully lifted bouquet shows blackberry
Brightly fruited and very easy on the palate, the wine shows youthful fruit flavours of dark cherries and plums.
